verbose_text: This already operational system allows to take into account the use of some PPE (not yet anti-COVID-19 facemasks and gloves) as well to provide personal daily maximum heat stress risk levels by using ISO-standard thermal stress approaches and behavioural suggestions (hydration and work breaks recommended) to be taken in the short term (5 days) together with long-term heat risk forecasts, up to 46 days, useful for planning working activities for employers, organizations and operators in charge of safeguarding health and productivity in various occupational areas.
